articles.author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
articles.description: Wally Plikat of Plikat Logging, Inc., a Roseburg-based logging firm, was selected as Forest Operator of the Year for Southwest Oregon earlier this fall.
articles.title: Roseburg logging firm recognized as top forest operator for Southwest Oregon

articles.author: GLORIA COLEMAN The News-Review
articles.description: ROSEBURG — Santa and his reindeer will be ready for photos from 2-6 p.m. Friday at Roseburg Honda, 1950 NW Mulholland Drive.
articles.title: Santa’s reindeer at Roseburg Honda Friday

articles.author: GLORIA COLEMAN The News-Review
articles.description: MYRTLE CREEK — Myrtle Creek Elementary School held their annual Tree Walk on Friday morning to allow students to decorate the city's Christmas tree.
articles.title: Myrtle Creek children decorate for Christmas

articles.description: DOUGLAS COUNTY — A flood watch is in effect through Wednesday afternoon.
articles.title: Flood watch in effect

articles.author: HANNAH SEIBOLD The News-Review
articles.description: WINSTON — The streets near Riverbend Park were scarce as rain beat down and the sun set before the annual Winston Christmas parade and tree lighting.
articles.title: A bit of rain doesn't stop the holiday lovers, tree lighting and parade

articles.description: RICE HILL — North Douglas County Fire and EMS is working to provide living quarters for its volunteers with the help of grant.
